scripts.prepublishOnly: if [[ ! $PWD =~ dist$ ]]; then echo 'ðŸš§ Use `npm run deploy` instead of `npm publish`!' && echo '' && exit 1; fi
scripts.build: npm run build:babel && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build:bundle: npm run build:bundle:base && npm run build:bundle:full
scripts.build:bundle:base: npm run build:bundle:base:modern && npm run build:bundle:base:umd
scripts.build:bundle:base:modern: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i src/index.js -o dist/index.modern.js -f modern --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
scripts.build:bundle:base:umd: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i src/index.js -o dist/index.umd.js -f umd --name Base --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
scripts.build:bundle:full: npm run build:bundle:full:modern && npm run build:bundle:full:umd
scripts.build:bundle:full:modern: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i src/full.js -o dist/full.modern.js -f modern --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
scripts.build:bundle:full:umd: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i src/full.js -o dist/full.umd.js -f umd --name JsToolkit --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp readme.md dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist/ && npm publish && rm package.json readme.md
